body:
Anime Night is a group (Me, Dooz and Zieno) that watches Anime every Midnight EST.
Since my Anime thread got a lot of feedback and many asked if they wanted to join this group, you may apply here :D

Skype:
Time Zone:
Your Anime List:

Trolls are not welcome! Those who start to annoy during the watching of an Anime will be removed without warning!

We watch Anime's in order... EX: We start with 1 series and finish, then we go to a new one.

Current Anime Watching: Sword Art Online

We take suggestions from fellow members of Le Anime Night :3

Current Member List
Robo
Dooz
Zieno
Panda
Dynamo
Lyyris
Cels
Juano
Spicy
Cole
SupriseG
Emmy

replies.body:
I might not be able to participate too much as timezones differ quite a bit but I guess I can participate during weekends and be active in the skype chat (If there's one of course)
Skype: McLyyris
Timezone: Gmt+2
Anime list: Copied from the other thread. Mekakucity actors, Mirai Nikki, Black Butler, Elfen lied, Code Geass, High school DxD (If you don't mind Ecchi), Angel Beats, Date a live, Fullmetal Alchemist (Both of them) and Death Note. I'll add more when I can think of them.
EDIT: Kill la Kill, Hunter x Hunter, Corpse party (Short but amazing), To love-Ru and Clannad.
EDIT: I forgot No Game No Life, how is that even possible? D:
